text: György Kárpáti (June 23, 1935 - June 17, 2020) was a Hungarian water polo player. He won gold medals at the 1952 Summer Olympics, 1956 Summer Olympics, 1960 Summer Olympics, and 1964 Summer Olympics. He was born in Budapest. He was part of the men's national water polo team. Kárpáti died on June 17, 2020 in Budapest at the age of 84.Gyász: elhunyt a háromszoros olimpiai bajnok Kárpáti György ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Olympic gold medalists for Hungary Category:Sportspeople from Budapest Category:Hungarian water polo players
title: György Kárpáti
